publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3518 Sandra White: Healthy Living Centre Transition Fund—That the Parliament welcomes the continuation of the healthy living centre transition fund through 2009-10; believes that the fund will afford healthy living centres throughout Scotland time to secure sustainable local funding for their invaluable services; acknowledges the great work done by the centres in promoting health, education and culture in the local community, and encourages centres to make full use of the extra funding available to secure their long-term future. Supported by: Christine Grahame*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-3518 Healthy Living Centre Transition Fund (lodged on 24 February 2009) Bob Doris*, Jamie Hepburn*, Angela Constance*, Bill Kidd*

S3M-3518 Sandra White: Healthy Living Centre Transition Fund—That the Parliament welcomes the continuation of the healthy living centre transition fund through 2009-10; believes that the fund will afford healthy living centres throughout Scotland time to secure sustainable local funding for their invaluable services; acknowledges the great work done by the centres in promoting health, education and culture in the local community, and encourages centres to make full use of the extra funding available to secure their long-term future. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Stuart McMillan, Bob Doris, Jamie Hepburn, Angela Constance, Bill Kidd
S3M-3518 Healthy Living Centre Transition Fund (lodged on 24 February 2009) Gil Paterson*
